summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Odessa Brown Clinic; authorizing an adjustment to the boundary of land conveyed by the City to Children's Hospital, by means of a deed from the City of a portion of Lot 4, Block 30, H.L. Yesler's First Addition to the City of Seattle and acceptance of a deed to the City for a portion of Lot 3, Block 8, Hill Tract Addition to the City of Seattle; and dedicating the property received, together with the remainder of said Lot 4, for park purposes.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
